dmca.title: [EV1-C1264760K] Re: Fwd: Re: TAKE DOWN NOTICE
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Sunday, October 08, 2006 12:19 AM Posted To: DMCA Houston Conversation: [EV1-C1264760K] Re: Fwd: Re: TAKE DOWN NOTICE Subject: [EV1-C1264760K] Re: Fwd: Re: TAKE DOWN NOTICE This was not sorted correctly ==== Original Message ==== (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multipart message in MIME format MIME element (text/html)
Dear Webidz Staff,
 
Thank you for your response.
 
Attached you will find the text versions of the two notices sent to you.
 
Below serves as my electronic signature as affidavit to this communication and the attached plain text documents.
 
Sincerely,
 
 
Marissa Rose Robison
Robison and Associates
PO Box 3234
Muskogee, OK 74402-3234
MROBISON@ROBISONASSOCIATES.ORG

----- Original Message -----
From: "Robert Windsor"
To: mrobison@robisonassociates.org
Sent: Sat, 7 Oct 2006 21:32:43 -0500
Subject: Fwd: Re: TAKE DOWN NOTICE
>
>
> --- Original Message ---
>
>
> From: "Webidz Admin"
> To: Robert Windsor
> Cc:
> Sent: Sat, 7 Oct 2006 16:59:59 -0700
> Subject: Re: TAKE DOWN NOTICE
>
> Marrissa,
>
> Please provide your documentation in RTF format, as we are having
> problems opening your PDF format document. Once we reeive this
> info, we will respond to your request within 72 hrs.
>
> Thanks,
>
>
> The Webidz Staff
>
>
> http://www.webidz.com
> The Other Auction Site...
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From:Robert Windsor
> To:sagefox@charter.net
> Cc:abuse@webidz.com ; admin@webidz.com ; administrator@webidz.com ;
> contact@webidz.com ; copyright@webidz.com ; domain@webidz.com ;
> mail@webidz.com ; sales@webidz.com ; support@webidz.com ;
> webmaster@webidz.com
> Sent: Saturday, September 30, 2006 10:55 PM
> Subject: TAKE DOWN NOTICE
>
> PSI HTML/CSS Generator
> www.webids.com
> James Sager (sagefox@charter.net)
> (509) 930-9025
> 702 N 38th St
> Yakima, WA 98901
>
> RE:    TAKE DOWN NOTICE
>
> Dear webids.com:
>
> Attached you will find legal notice to take down an auction that is
> unlawfully using copyrighted material owned by EZ Guide Books.
>
>
> Sincerely,
>
>
> Marissa Rose Robison
> Robison and Associates
> PO Box 3234
> Muskogee, OK 74402-3234
> MROBISON@ROBISONASSOCIATES.ORG
MIME element (text/plain) Robison & Associates 2608 West Kenosha Street ( Suite 154 ( Broken Arrow, OK 74012 PO Box 3234 ( Muskogee, OK 74402-3234 September 30, 2006 www.webids.com James Sager (sagefox@charter.net) (509) 930-9025 702 N 38th St Yakima, WA 98901 RE: NOTICE OF WILLFUL COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT HTTP://WWW.WEBIDZ.COM/AUCTIONDETAILS.PHP?ID=674945 NOTICE TO TAKE DOWN PURSUANT TO 17 U.S.C. § 512(c) Dear Sir or Ma'am: Pursuant to United States Code title 17 § 512, this communication shall serve as formal notice to you that you are maintaining materials on your servers that infringe on the copyrights of EZ Guide Books. The infringing materials are in violation of United States Code title 17 § 501 and are lawfully subject to expeditious removal pursuant to said code and the Digital Millennium Copyright Act. 1. Identity Of The Copyrighted Work That Has Been Infringed. The copyrighted material owned by EZ Guide Books is identified as http://ebaysuspension.ezguidebooks.com, in it's entirety, including all texts, pictures, links, pages and materials thereof, along with the electronic book available from the aforementioned website entitled "How to get back on ebay", in it's entirety, including all texts, pictures, links, pages and materials thereof, having been originally developed, affixed, submitted to and received by the Register of Copyrights for the United States Library of Congress by it's original author, Robert Windsor, collectively referred to as "EZ Guide Books". 2. Identity of the Material That is Infringing. The infringing material is identified as: http://www.webidz.com/auctiondetails.php?id=674945 The infringing auction's owner, without consent, authorization or license from EZ Guide Books, is unlawfully using the original copyrighted material owned by EZ Guide Books for the promotion and sale of "screen shots" delivered in a zip file to the purchaser. 3. Contact Information for EZ Guide Books. In the interest of expediency, contact by email is preferred. All correspondence regarding this matter is to be sent to the following: Robison & Associates PO Box 3234 Muskogee, OK 74402-3234 MROBISON@ROBISONASSOCIATES.ORG 4. Contact Information for Owner/Administrator of the Web Site Containing Infringing Material. The individual operating this auction is using the name of "CheapGameCash". 5. Good Faith Statement and Affidavit. The affidavit is attached hereto as Exhibit A. 6. Intellectual Property Rights Preservation and Enforcement. EZ Guide Books hereby expressly reserves all rights. No statement contained herein is intended as nor shall be deemed to constitute a limit, waiver or relinquishment of EZ Guide Books' rights or remedies, in whole or part, at law, in equity or otherwise. This notice does not constitute a complete or exhaustive statement of EZ Guide Books' rights, claims, contentions or legal pursuits regarding this matter, including but not limited to the pursuit of criminal prosecution by the United States Attorney's office in cooperation with the United States Federal Bureau of Investigation against the infringing individuals, affiliates, associates and assigns, pursuant to United States Code Title 17 § 506, the Digital Millennium Copyright Act and International Copyright Protection Treaties. Exhibit A AFFIDAVIT I, Marissa Rose Robison, declare the following: 1. Pursuant to United States Code Title 17 § 501(c)(3)(A)(v), I have a good faith belief use of the copyrighted materials as described above is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 2. Pursuant to United States Code Title 17 § 501(c)(3)(A)(vi), I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. ____________________________________ Marissa Rose Robison Page 1 of 3 MIME element (text/plain) Robison & Associates 2608 West Kenosha Street ( Suite 154 ( Broken Arrow, OK 74012 PO Box 3234 ( Muskogee, OK 74402-3234 October 6, 2006 TO: EVERYONES INTERNET 390 BENMAR SUITE 200 HOUSTON, TX 77060 ABUSE@EV1.NET CC: WWW.WEBIDZ.COM JAMES SAGER 702 N 38TH ST YAKIMA, WA 98901 ADMIN@WEBIDZ.COM RE: NOTICE OF WILLFUL COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT HTTP://WWW.WEBIDZ.COM/AUCTIONDETAILS.PHP?ID=674945 NOTICE TO TAKE DOWN PURSUANT TO 17 U.S.C. § 512(c) Dear Everyones Internet: I represent EZ Guide Books, the copyright owner and the publisher of the authored work entitled "How to Get Back on eBay". On September 30, 2006, it came to our attention that copyrighted material belonging to EZ Guide Books' had been and is currently being used in an auction, and offered for sale from said auction, from the website webidz.com. Such uses of EZ Guide Books' authored works without the express authorization or license has caused and continues to cause substantial and irreparable injury and is in direct violation of EZ Guide Books' rights, including, without limitation, those under the United States Copyright Act. The domain's owner, webidz.com, was immediately notified of the infringement activity. To date the infringing material has not been removed from the webidz website, nor has any contact been received from webidz regarding this matter. Pursuant to United States Code title 17 § 512, this communication shall serve as formal notice to you that you are maintaining materials on your servers that infringe on the copyrights of EZ Guide Books. The infringing materials are in violation of United States Code title 17 § 501 and are lawfully subject to expeditious removal pursuant to said code and the Digital Millennium Copyright Act. 1. Identity Of The Copyrighted Work That Has Been Infringed. The copyrighted material owned by EZ Guide Books is identified as http://ebaysuspension.ezguidebooks.com, in it's entirety, including all texts, pictures, links, pages and materials thereof, along with the electronic book available from the aforementioned website entitled "How to get back on ebay", in it's entirety, including all texts, pictures, links, pages and materials thereof, having been originally developed, affixed, submitted to and received by the Register of Copyrights for the United States Library of Congress by it's original author, Robert Windsor, collectively referred to as "EZ Guide Books". 2. Identity of the Material That is Infringing. The infringing material is identified as: http://www.webidz.com/auctiondetails.php?id=674945 The infringing auction's owner, without consent, authorization or license from EZ Guide Books, is unlawfully using the original copyrighted material owned by EZ Guide Books for the promotion and sale of "screen shots" delivered in a zip file to the purchaser. 3. Contact Information for EZ Guide Books. In the interest of expediency, contact by email is preferred. All correspondence regarding this matter is to be sent to the following: Robison & Associates PO Box 3234 Muskogee, OK 74402-3234 MROBISON@ROBISONASSOCIATES.ORG 4. Contact Information for Owner/Administrator of the Web Site Containing Infringing Material. The individual operating this auction is using the name of "CheapGameCash". 5. Good Faith Statement and Affidavit. The affidavit is attached hereto as Exhibit A. 6. Intellectual Property Rights Preservation and Enforcement. EZ Guide Books hereby expressly reserves all rights. No statement contained herein is intended as nor shall be deemed to constitute a limit, waiver or relinquishment of EZ Guide Books' rights or remedies, in whole or part, at law, in equity or otherwise. This notice does not constitute a complete or exhaustive statement of EZ Guide Books' rights, claims, contentions or legal pursuits regarding this matter pursuant to United States Code Title 17 § 506, the Digital Millennium Copyright Act and International Copyright Protection Treaties. Exhibit A AFFIDAVIT I, Marissa Rose Robison, declare the following: 1. Pursuant to United States Code Title 17 § 501(c)(3)(A)(v), I have a good faith belief use of the copyrighted materials as described above is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 2. Pursuant to United States Code Title 17 § 501(c)(3)(A)(vi), I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. ____________________________________ Marissa Rose Robison Page 1 of 3 MIME element (text/plain)
